001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JarCommand;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.PathSupport;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.DeclaredModule;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.FolderType;
011import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
012import java.io.File;
013import java.nio.file.Path;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.stream.Collectors;
017
018/** Compiles and archives Java source files. */
019public class CompileWorkflow extends AbstractSpaceWorkflow {
020
021  public CompileWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
022    super(bach, project, space);
023  }
024
025  protected JavacCommand computeJavacCommand(Path classes) {
026    return computeJavacCommand(computeReleaseVersionFeatureNumber(), classes);
027  }
028
029  protected JavacCommand computeJavacCommand(int release, Path classes) {
030    var releaseOption = JavacCommand.ReleaseOption.of(release);
031    var computedModuleSourcePath = ModuleSourcePathComputer.compute(space);
032    return Command.javac()
033        .modules(space.modules().names())
034        .option(releaseOption)
035        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.patterns())
036        .option(computedModuleSourcePath.specifics())
037        .option(computeModulePathsOption())
038        .outputDirectoryForClasses(classes);
039  }
040
041  protected List<Path> computeRelease8ClassPaths(Path classes) {
042    var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
043    space.modules().names().forEach(name -> paths.add(classes.resolve(name)));
044    // TODO What about modular JAR files built for parent spaces?
045    paths.addAll(PathSupport.list(bach.path().externalModules(), PathSupport::isJarFile));
046    return List.copyOf(paths);
047  }
048
049  protected List<Path> computeRelease8JavaSourceFiles(DeclaredModule module) {
050    var sources = module.folders().list(0, FolderType.SOURCES);
051    return PathSupport.find(sources, 99, PathSupport::isJava8File);
052  }
053
054  protected List<JavacCommand> computeRelease8JavacCommands(Path classes) {
055    var classPath =
056        computeRelease8ClassPaths(classes).stream()
057            .map(Path::toString)
058            .collect(Collectors.joining(File.pathSeparator));
059    var commands = new ArrayList<JavacCommand>();
060    for (var module : space.modules()) {
061      var java8Files = computeRelease8JavaSourceFiles(module);
062      if (java8Files.isEmpty()) continue;
063      var javac =
064          Command.javac()
065              .option(JavacCommand.ReleaseOption.of(8))
066              .add("--class-path", classPath)
067              .add("-implicit:none")
068              .outputDirectoryForClasses(classes.resolve(module.name()))
069              .addAll(java8Files);
070      commands.add(javac);
071    }
072    return List.copyOf(commands);
073  }
074
075  protected JavacCommand computeMultiReleaseJavacCommand(
076      int release, String module, Path classes, List<Path> javaSourceFiles) {
077    return Command.javac()
078        .option(JavacCommand.ReleaseOption.of(release))
079        .option(computeModulePathsOption())
080        .add("--class-path", classes.resolve(module))
081        .add("-implicit:none")
082        .outputDirectoryForClasses(computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(module, release))
083        .addAll(javaSourceFiles);
084  }
085
086  protected List<JavacCommand> computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(
087      DeclaredModule module, Path classes) {
088    var commands = new ArrayList<JavacCommand>();
089    for (var release = 9; release <= Runtime.version().feature(); release++) {
090      var roots = module.folders().list(release, FolderType.SOURCES);
091      if (roots.isEmpty()) continue;
092      var sources = PathSupport.find(roots, 99, PathSupport::isJavaFile);
093      commands.add(computeMultiReleaseJavacCommand(release, module.name(), classes, sources));
094    }
095    return commands;
096  }
097
098  protected List<JavacCommand> computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(Path classes) {
099    var commands = new ArrayList<JavacCommand>();
100    for (var module : space.modules())
101      commands.addAll(computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(module, classes));
102    return commands;
103  }
104
105  protected JarCommand computeJarCommand(DeclaredModule module, Path classes, Path modules) {
106    var name = module.name();
107    var version = project.version().value();
108    var file = modules.resolve(name + "@" + version + ".jar");
109
110    var jar = Command.jar().mode("--create").file(file).add("--module-version", version);
111
112    if (module.mainClass().isPresent()) jar = jar.main(module.mainClass().get());
113
114    var folders = module.folders();
115    var baseSources = folders.list(0, FolderType.SOURCES);
116    if (!baseSources.isEmpty()) jar = jar.filesAdd(classes.resolve(name));
117    var baseResources = folders.list(0, FolderType.RESOURCES);
118    for (var resource : baseResources) jar = jar.filesAdd(resource);
119
120    //    if (computedModulePatches.mode() == PatchMode.CLASSES) {
121    //      var list = computedModulePatches.map().getOrDefault(name, List.of());
122    //      jar = jar.forEach(list, (call, path) -> call.with("-C", path, "."));
123    //    }
124
125    // multi-release
126    for (var release = 9; release <= Runtime.version().feature(); release++) {
127      if (!folders.list(release, FolderType.SOURCES).isEmpty()) {
128        jar = jar.filesAdd(release, computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(name, release));
129      }
130      for (var resource : folders.list(release, FolderType.RESOURCES)) {
131        jar = jar.filesAdd(release, resource);
132      }
133    }
134
135    return jar;
136  }
137
138  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForClasses() {
139    var computedNumber = computeReleaseVersionFeatureNumber();
140    var release = computedNumber == 0 ? Runtime.version().feature() : computedNumber;
141    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "classes-" + release);
142  }
143
144  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForClasses(String module, int release) {
145    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "classes-mr-" + release, module);
146  }
147
148  @Override
149  public void run() {
150    var modules = space.modules().values();
151    if (modules.isEmpty()) {
152      bach.logMessage("No %s module present".formatted(space.name()));
153      return;
154    }
155    var size = modules.size();
156    bach.logCaption("Compile %d %s module%s".formatted(size, space.name(), size == 1 ? "" : "s"));
157
158    var classesDirectory = computeOutputDirectoryForClasses();
159    var modulesDirectory = computeOutputDirectoryForModules(space);
160
161    if (space.release() == 8) {
162      bach.run(computeJavacCommand(9, classesDirectory));
163      computeRelease8JavacCommands(classesDirectory).stream().parallel().forEach(bach::run);
164    } else {
165      bach.run(computeJavacCommand(classesDirectory));
166    }
167
168    var multiReleases = computeMultiReleaseJavacCommands(classesDirectory);
169    if (multiReleases.size() >= 1) {
170      bach.logCaption("Compile multi-release sources");
171      multiReleases.stream().parallel().forEach(bach::run);
172    }
173
174    bach.run(Command.of("directories", "clean", modulesDirectory));
175    modules.stream()
176        .parallel()
177        .map(module -> computeJarCommand(module, classesDirectory, modulesDirectory))
178        .forEach(bach::run);
179  }
180}
